issue.title: [CF 838] Help with TMW
issue.body:
So I looked everywhere on here for where to do this at and didn't find what I need. I have a profile of someone elses TMW that they use, how do I put that on my addon so I can use the same setup?


> Posted by CurseForge user iamslowlvl85dk | Imported from CurseForge issue #838 | Raw

comments.body:

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just started using TMW and I mistakenly hit the "don't show again" to the initial config dialog and I'd like that changed so the dialog would show, but I can;t seem to figure out how.. help pls?

> Posted by CurseForge user BrightBrown
